title: Instructional Design Based on Teaching Presence for Forming Online Mathematics Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Provision of digital devices (tablets/laptops), enhanced math problem-solving and discussion-based activities, with synchronous/asynchronous interaction

learning_goals: Learners perform collaborative problem-solving with peers at least three times per week on online discussion platforms
Learners achieve an 80%+ feedback incorporation rate from instructors through formative assessments
Learners achieve a 4.0/5.0+ satisfaction score in the online learning community survey at semester’s end
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
